text: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
author: Helen Keller

text: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you’ll start having positive results.
author: Willie Nelson

text: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

text: I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter.
author: Walt Disney

text: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
author: William James

text: You can’t make positive choices for the rest of your life without an environment that makes those choices easy, natural, and enjoyable.
author: Deepak Chopra

text: The thing that lies at the foundation of positive change, the way I see it, is service to a fellow human being.
author: Lee lacocca

text: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
author: Les Brown

text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

text: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

text: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

text: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe
